        public World parse(java.lang.String input)
            throws RowNumberException,
                   RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException,
                   ColumnNumberException,
                   EmptyLineException,
                   NotAnIntException,
                   LineHasNotJustIntegersException,
                   SpecifierNotRecognisedException,
                   UnsupportedSizeOfSpecifierException
        Specified by:
        parse in interface Parser
        Parameters:
        input - A String representing an ant world
        Returns:
        A World object parsed from the input string
        Throws:
        RowNumberException - Stated row size differs from actual
        RowDoesntStartWithWhitespaceException - Every odd row has to start with a whitespace
        ColumnNumberException - Stated column size differs from actual
        EmptyLineException
        NotAnIntException
        LineHasNotJustIntegersException
        SpecifierNotRecognisedException
        UnsupportedSizeOfSpecifierException

      • getSize

                     throws LineHasNotJustIntegersException,
                            EmptyLineException,
                            NotAnIntException
        Parameters:
        input - a string representing a numeric value
        Returns:
        A MapSizeToken object with the specified size
        Throws:
        LineHasNotJustIntegersException - expected only integers
        EmptyLineException - empty line
        NotAnIntException - expected only integers

      • getWorldTokens

        public void getWorldTokens(java.lang.String s,
                  int xposition,
                  int yposition)
                    throws UnsupportedSizeOfSpecifierException,
                           SpecifierNotRecognisedException,
                           EmptyLineException
        Parameters:
        s - representing a single cell identifier
        xposition - x coordinate of the cell in the world
        yposition - y coordinate of the cell in the world
        Throws:
        UnsupportedSizeOfSpecifierException - cell specifier of wrong size
        SpecifierNotRecognisedException - Could not recognise specifier
        EmptyLineException
